shell_license_compliant.text: By uploading this extension I agree and verify that in any controversial case regarding the compatibility of extension's license with the GNOME Shell's license, the extension uploaded by me may be used by any GNOME Shell user under the terms of the license used by GNOME Shell

tos_compliant.text: I agree that a staff of extensions.gnome.org website may remove, modify or reassign maintainership of the extension uploaded by me
